bibl.title: Goddess of Love and Mistress of the Sea. Notes on a Hellenistic Hymn to Arsinoe-Aphrodite (P. Lit. Goodspeed 2, I-IV). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Expanded version of a paper presented at the conference La cultura ellenistica: il libro, l'opera letteraria e l'esegesi antica, Università di Roma, Tor Vergata, 22-24 September 2003. - P. Coll. privées: P. Goodspeed Inv. 101 (actuellement P. Chic. Univ. Libr. Inv. MS 1061 [P. lit. Goodspeed 2]) (= Pack2 1620). - The papyrus. - The hymn to Aphrodite. - Arsinoe-Aphrodite / Isis, Lady of the Sea. - Arsinoe city-goddess: a possible Cypriot link? - Cypriot technitai. - Genre and performance.
bibl.seg: BARBANTANI Silvia, Goddess of Love and Mistress of the Sea. Notes on a Hellenistic Hymn to Arsinoe-Aphrodite (P. Lit. Goodspeed 2, I-IV). Avec résumé en anglais.

Expanded version of a paper presented at the conference La cultura ellenistica: il libro, l'opera letteraria e l'esegesi antica, Università di Roma, Tor Vergata, 22-24 September 2003. - P. Coll. privées: P. Goodspeed Inv. 101 (actuellement P. Chic. Univ. Libr. Inv. MS 1061 [P. lit. Goodspeed 2]) (= Pack2 1620). - The papyrus. - The hymn to Aphrodite. - Arsinoe-Aphrodite / Isis, Lady of the Sea. - Arsinoe city-goddess: a possible Cypriot link? - Cypriot technitai. - Genre and performance.
